summary: This is an email from June 27, 2008, forwarding a corrected third supplement to a prosecution memorandum and corrected penalty sheets related to the Epstein case. It indicates ongoing legal proceedings and document revisions.

events.title: Correction of Prosecution Memorandum Supplement
events.description: An email is sent containing a corrected third supplement to a prosecution memorandum and corrected penalty sheets.

keyFacts: A corrected third supplement to a prosecution memorandum was finalized on June 27, 2008.
Corrected penalty sheets were also being sent alongside the memo supplement.
The document indicates ongoing legal case preparation or revision related to Jeffrey Epstein.
